title: eLiyEnum kaLi kUra
sahitya:
eLiyEnum kaLi kUra tuLiyEnum unnaruLai aLippAi iniyEnum Arumukhap-pErALA


anupallavi

  aLaviDa muDiyAda aruL jyOtik-kaDalAgha viLangum ezhlODu oLi vIsum murugEsA


caraNam    kaDal nIraip-parughiDum karu mEgham urumAri aDai mazhaiyAip-pozhiya avani tazhaippadu pOl
paDi mIdu unnaruL mAri aDiyArin iDar tIra tuDaittiDavE avar kaDaittEri viDuvArE
